message.body: Ohhh what an interesting name... Hello Andromeda
Hi Squid! I've been cleaning up a glitter spill.
Daughter and classmates were given "goody bags" of leftover craft supplies by their teachers.
She opened the ziploc bag of glitter while I was distracted.
Awww What a mess. All of my peers generally agree that glitter may be the communicable disease of art. Did you get things tidied up?
